about.title: About
about.tagline: Experimental Hip Hop Artist • Lyricist • Creative Director
about.origin: f3dRaL Spandexx TeXTfuLL a.k.a. f3d is an experimental hip hop artist based in SpandiLand. His love for music developed at a very tender age, and he chose rap music as his compartment of expression, writing poems was his daily activity. He was deeply fascinated by lyrical songs, so he started to freestyle.
about.journey: f3dRaL explores music through networking, music production (with talented beat-makers who cross genres), event management, and artistic direction as a lyricist. He has worked with several creative and cultural entities on different aspects of art, such as artistic direction, promotion, networking, and branding for over a decade.
about.vision: f3dRaL's state of mind ripples through music production accompanied by aesthetic visuals, Avant-Garde ideas, augmented reality and virtual reality. A trendsetter with infinite bandwidths of creativity.

about.ctaText: Experience the intersection of experimental hip hop, cutting-edge visuals, and boundless creativity. Join the journey through SpandiLand.
